response.overview: What’s the perfect formula for fun? Start with 1part innoventions, 1 part technology and a  dash of international flare add a sprinkle of pixie dust, and you have it Epcot.  Come awaken your senses and explore the wondrous worlds of Epcot, just after the millennium celebration in the early 2000s.  Professor “Sy N. Tific”, as in Scientific is our guide as we explore Walt Disney World’s Epcot.  We tour every corner of Epcot with some interesting facts along the way. A time capsule of Epcot just after the Millennium celebration, when the 2000 wand over Spaceship Earth changed to Epcot.
response.title: Epcot Where Dreams Come True
